info.description: Rokwire Groups Building Block API Documentation.
info.title: Rokwire Groups Building Block API

get.description: Gives the group events.
Retrieves stats for a group by id
gets all posts for the desired group.

delete.description: Updates a post within the desired group.

get.description: Gives the groups list. It can be filtered by category

parameters.description: Filtering by group's title - case insensitive
parameters.name: title

get.description: Gets managed group configs

put.description: Updates an existing managed group config

post.description: Creates a new managed group config

get.description: Gets sync config
Gives the groups list. It can be filtered by category

parameters.description: include_hidden - Includes hidden groups if a search by title is performed. Possible value is true. Default false.
parameters.name: include_hidden

get.description: Logs in the user and refactor the user record and linked data if need
Gives the groups list. It can be filtered by category, title and privacy. V2

parameters.description: include_hidden - Includes hidden groups if a search by title is performed. Possible value is true. Default false.
parameters.name: include_hidden

get.description: Gives a group. V2
Gives the user groups. It can be filtered by category, title and privacy. V2.

post.description: Synchronizes Authman group. Only admin of the group could initiate the operation

get.description: Gives the group events.
Gives the group events.
Gets the list of group members. The result would be empty if the current user doesn't belong to the requested group.

post.description: Adds a member to a group. The current user is required to be an admin of the group

delete.description: Deletes a member membership from a group

get.description: gets all posts for the desired group.

post.description: creates a post within the desired group.

get.description: Gets a post within the desired group.

put.description: Updates a post within the desired group.

delete.description: Updates a post within the desired group.

put.description: Reacts to a post within the desired group.

get.description: Gives the groups list. It can be filtered by category

parameters.description: include_hidden - Includes hidden groups if a search by title is performed. Possible value is true. Default false.
parameters.name: include_hidden

post.description: Creates a group. The user must be part ofurn:mace:uiuc.edu:urbana:authman:app-rokwire-service-policy-rokwire groups access. Title must be a unique. Category must be one of the categories list. Privacy can be public or private

get.description: Gives a group
Retrieves group members by  title
Retrieves group details and members
Gives the user groups memberships

put.description: Updates a membership. Only admin can update membership. Member is not allowed to update his/her own record.

delete.description: Deletes a user with all the involved information from the Notifications BB (this includes - group membership & posts (and child posts - no matter of the creator))

get.description: Gives the user groups memberships
Gives the user groups.
Logs in the user and refactor the user record and linked data if need
Gets user stat information. Responds with {"posts_count": xxx}
Gives the groups list. It can be filtered by category, title and privacy. V2

parameters.description: include_hidden - Includes hidden groups if a search by title is performed. Possible value is true. Default false.
parameters.name: include_hidden

get.description: Gives a group. V2
Gives the user groups. It can be filtered by category, title and privacy. V2.
Retrieve group stats
Gives the service version.

to_members.description: nil or empty means everyone; non-empty means visible to those user ids and admins

category.description: one of the enums categories list

current_member.description: this is indicative and it's not required for update APIs

status.description: TODO: This is dangerous code-breaking change. There are existing clients that may use it in the old way.

sync_id.description: ID of sync that last updated this membership

to_members.description: nil or empty means everyone; non-empty means visible to those user ids and admins
nil or empty means everyone; non-empty means visible to those user ids and admins

group_timeout.description: Time from sync_start_time to be considered a failed run for a single group in minutes

time_threshold.description: Threshold from start_time to be considered same run in minutes

timeout.description: Time from start_time to be considered a failed run in minutes
